name: Thrust into Love - A Mara Dating Game
name_original: Thrust into Love - A Mara Dating Game
description:
Your friend has set you up on a blind date but your date is a penis monster?! Oh no!

Features:

1. 1 love interest (Why would you want to date anybody other than Mara?)

2. 3 Endings (1 good ending as a male MC and female LI, 1 good ending as female MC and male LI, and 1 unisex bad ending)

3. Plentiful sexual innuendos

4. A lot of romance

5. 700~ Word count
